name: Human Factors International
overview: Human Factors International, Inc. provides strategic advisory and user experience design services, and training to private and public sectors. It offers a range of services for testing of Web sites and software applications; and a range of public and onsite training, and certification services. The company also offers visual design consulting and production, tech specification and licensing, and knowledge repository services. It offers its solutions to financial services/insurance, telecommunications, government, automotive, healthcare, travel and hospitality, shipping, appliances, aerospace, commercial software, energy, hardware, software development, e-commerce and portals, media, and medical clients. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Fairfield, Iowa with additional offices in Fairfield, Iowa; New York; San Francisco and London, the United Kingdom; Mumbai, Bangalore, and Pondicherry, India; Singapore; and Shanghai, China.
